features.title: GHG Information Management
features.summary: We help you manage all your Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions information effectively and accurately. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive system to identify, quantify, monitor, report and reduce your organization's GHG emissions.
how: We review all your operations to identify and classify sources of emissions using standards such as the GHG Protocol and ISO 14064-1.
We determine your organization's specific needs in terms of GHG management.
We create and adapt specific formats for the collection, validation and storage of emissions data.
We train your team so they can use the system efficiently and understand the importance of GHG management.
We provide manuals and guidelines to ensure the correct and continuous use of the system.
We offer tools for continuous monitoring of emissions.
We provide ongoing support to solve problems and optimize the system.
We conduct periodic internal audits to ensure that the system is working properly and meeting the established objectives.
benefits: Total Control: Monitor and record all your emissions in one place, facilitating information management and decision making.
It provides a clear picture of how to manage GHG emissions.

features.title: Development of GHG Inventory / Carbon footprint reporting
features.summary: We perform a detailed diagnosis of all your Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions so you know exactly where they come from and how to reduce them. We provide a solid basis for the development of effective reduction strategies.
how: We collect comprehensive information on all your operational activities and processes.
We use primary and secondary data to ensure complete coverage of all sources of emissions.
We use international standards such as the GHG Protocol and ISO 14064-1 to classify and analyze your emissions into Scopes 1, 2 and 3.
We break down emissions by category and process, providing a clear view of your carbon footprint.
We provide a comprehensive report including GHG inventory and detailed analysis.
We offer specific recommendations to reduce emissions and improve operational efficiency.
benefits: Clear Vision: Identify all your sources of emissions and understand their impact.
Effective Strategies: Baseline for developing reduction plans based on sound data and detailed analysis.
